question:
Which among the following acted as the key documents which was/ were produced by B.V Patel and V.P Menon?
1. Standstill Agreement
2. Instrument of Accession
3. Forceful integration
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Standstill Agreement and the Instrument of Accession acted as the key documents which were produced by B.V Patel and V.P Menon. Standstill Agreement ensured the continuance of the pre-existing agreements and Instrument of Accession provided control over specified subject matters.
